Web Design

The website redesign for Dr. Lisa Esposito is complete

We've finished the project for this Boston-area artist

27 March 2015

Remember how Lisa Esposito's site used to look?

Check out the previous post on it if you're unfamiliar with it. Here's the new home page - much better we think!

The new website is mobile-optimized to adapt to any size device. Here is mockup of a device spread to demonstrate how the home page presents nicely on a range of screen sizes.

Visit her website on your phone or tablet to see it in action!

Site Link | www.LisaEsposito.com
